programlisting:
def delete_config_rule(self, rule_name): """ Delete the specified rule.
:param rule_name: The name of the rule to delete. """ try: self.config_client.delete_config_rule(ConfigRuleName=rule_name) logger.info("Deleted rule %s.", rule_name) except ClientError: logger.exception("Couldn't delete rule %s.", rule_name) raise
